meta.job_title: Oracle EBS Systems - Techno Functional Consultant

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate cross-functional solutions & integration effort in the manufacturing & supply chain space including but not limited to planning, operations, logistics, procurement, and finance.
Collaborate at high level with Business Management and system users in the ongoing development of Business Process leveraging System Capability and ongoing System Development.
Transform High Level Business requirements into detailed project plans and requirement documents.
Continuous engagement with the Information Technology team is required to implement system enhancements and fixes, requiring understanding of IT terminology, processes, and capabilities.
Design, Implement and Roll Out solutions on Oracle EBS R12 with integration to Kinaxis Rapid Response, EDI, Supplier Portal, MES etc.

Support Global user community in a wide range of support activities such as issue resolution, troubleshooting, system enhancements, report development, system setups and configuration and ongoing training activities.
Balance independent work & group contributions effectively

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Information Systems (Master’s degree preferred)
